knimeNode.name: Odds
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query betting odds from the Football API

intro.p: Queries betting odds from the Football API. Supports queries by fixture ID, league/season, or live odds for currently ongoing fixtures. Returns odds from multiple bookmakers and bet types.
Note: Odds data is typically only available for recent and upcoming fixtures. Historical odds may be limited depending on your API subscription.

fullDescription.option:
Select how to query odds:
By Fixture ID: Get odds for a specific fixture
By League/Season: Get odds for all fixtures in league and season
Live Odds: Get odds for currently live fixtures
For fixture ID queries, specify the numeric fixture ID.
For league/season queries, select the league.
For league/season queries, select the season year.
Optional: Filter odds by specific bookmaker name (e.g., Bet365, Betway).
Optional: Filter by bet type (e.g., Match Winner, Goals Over/Under).

ports.inPort: API-Sports connection from the API-Connector node
Reference data (leagues, seasons) from the Reference Data Loader node
ports.outPort: Table containing odds data with columns: Fixture_ID, League, Bookmaker_ID, Bookmaker_Name, Bet_Type, Bet_Value, Odd
